name: Sanjeev Kapoor
bio:
Sanjeev Kapoor is an Indian celebrity chef, entrepreneur, and television personality. He is best known as the author of numerous Indian cookbooks and as the host of popular cooking shows such as Khana Khazana, which aired for more than 18 years on Zee TV. Kapoor has also launched his own food channel, FoodFood, and has opened several successful restaurants both in India and abroad. 

Kapoor's passion for cooking began at an early age, when he would help his mother in the kitchen. After graduating from the Institute of Hotel Management in Pusa, New Delhi, he worked in some of the top hotel kitchens in India and abroad. However, it was his television show Khana Khazana that made him a household name in India and helped him reach a wider audience. 

Apart from his culinary pursuits, Kapoor is also involved in several philanthropic activities. He has worked with the Akshaya Patra Foundation to provide mid-day meals to schoolchildren, and has also supported other causes such as disaster relief and girl child education. 

Today, Kapoor is one of the most well-known and respected chefs in India, and continues to inspire and educate people with his innovative recipes and cooking techniques.
